In a lush forest, a single green leaf clung to a branch while all others fell to the ground. The leaf, named Lira, was enchanted, blessed by a gentle breeze that whispered tales of the seasons. As autumn approached, Lira watched her friends spiral down, turning crimson and gold. Loneliness crept in, yet she found solace in the stories of the wind. One day, a young girl named Mia wandered into the forest, feeling lost. Lira’s vibrant hue caught her eye, igniting hope in her heart. Inspired, Mia climbed the tree, plucked Lira, and took her home—a reminder that some things are meant to endure.
